Package cchase.platformergame

Class BattleNew

java.lang.Object
cchase.platformergame.BattleNew
public class BattleNew extends Object
BattleNew.java BattleNew serves as the UI as well as controls the flow of battle. Currently, this is being made to replace Battle.java and allow features such as multiple characters and selecting which enemy you would like to attack. TODO: Implement Magic and Abilities, Implement a flag for when all enemies are defeated. Put code in place to test for status (Maybe have a enum called status, with things like dead?) With above, when the player is dead, they shouldn't be able to do anything, or be attacked... It would be funny though Current Bugs: Null pointer exception is caused when the player selects Defend on all characters. Code that is causing the bug is currently commented out

  • Method Details

    • render

      public void render(float delta)

    • playerSpriteUpdate

      public void playerSpriteUpdate()
      Updates the players sprites. Uses a for loop and as long as a battle isn't occuring, their state is set to stance.

    • enemySpriteUpdate

      public void enemySpriteUpdate()
      Updates the enemies sprites. Uses a for loop and as long as a battle isn't occurring, their state is set to stance

    • turnManager

      public void turnManager()
      This might be broken. Currently, manages turns.

    • menuFlow

      public void menuFlow()
      Assists with how the menus are handled within battle. Does not account for everything, such as the magic or abilities list.

    • enemyTurnExecution

      public void enemyTurnExecution()
      Lines up the enemies moves to be added to the action linked list. If the enemy isn't dead, they attack a random player. TODO: The enemy can attack from the dead.

    • enemyKilled

      public void enemyKilled()

    • setEnemyStatus

      public void setEnemyStatus()
      Sets the enemy status to dead if their health is at or below 0. To be placed within a render method so that health status is constantly updated.

    • playerWon

      public boolean playerWon()
      Returns true if the player has won yet. This method runs through each enemy to see if all of them are alive.
      Returns:
      true if all enemy objects status is reported dead, false if otherwise

    • playerFlee

      public boolean playerFlee()

    • dispose

      public void dispose()
      Disposes the stage when the battle is done TODO: Probably needs to be reworked.
